      static java.lang.String[][] QMFood.viewIngredientsInMeal(int mealID, Database database)
      View ingredients in a meal Returns list of ingredients in a meal in a two-dimensional String array First index is row, second is column

      Columns by second index:
      0 : ingredient_id - int
      1 : name - String
      2 : quantity - int (quantity in meal)
      3 : quantity - int (quantity in stock)
      4 : unit - String
      static java.lang.String[][] QMFood.viewMeals(Database database)
      View meals.
      static java.lang.String[][] QMOrder.viewMealsInOrder(int orderID, Database database)
      Returns all meals in an order in a two-dimensional String array
      First index is row, second is column

      Columns by second index:
      0 : meal_id - int
      1 : meal_name - String
      2 : instructions - String
      3 : available - boolean
      4 : price - int
      5 : order_id - int
      6 : delivery_date - String
      7 : quantity - int
      8 : ready_delivery
      9 : delivered
      static java.lang.String[][] QMFood.viewMealsInPlan(int subID, Database database)
      View all meals in subscription plan in database Returns list of meals in a two-dimensional String array ordered by weekday First index is row, second is column Columns by second index: 0 : meal_id - int 1 : meal_name - String 2 : instructions - String 3 : available - int/boolean 4 : price - int 5 : sub_id - int 6 : weekday_nr - int 7 : weekday - String
      static java.lang.String[] QMOrder.viewOrder(int orderID, Database database)

      First index is row, second is column

      Columns by second index:
      0 : order_id - int
      1 : order_date - String
      2 : customer_id - int
      3 : info - String
      4 : user_id - String
